titleStmt.title: To the honorable the knights, citizens and burgesses of the Commons House in Parliament assembled The humble petition of the Lord Major, aldermen, and commons of the Citie of London in Common Councell assembled.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: August 9. 1643. London printed for Thomas Vnderhill,

notesStmt.note: Praying that "justice may be done upon offenders and delinquents.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
